name: NBBLs Paywall
author: Hamiltons

sections.description:
Discover a new dimension of control and monetization for your website with NBBL, the ultimate solution for managing free and premium content on your WordPress platform.

What is NBBL?

NBBL is your passport to the world of advanced content management in WordPress. This powerful plugin has been designed to breathe life into your ideas and deliver an exceptional user experience while maximizing your monetization opportunities.

Also, your users can use those NBBLs from any other platform which supports NBBLs, and not only in your webpage.

Overview

  1. Free and Premium Content: Now you can offer a strategic blend of freely accessible articles and premium content that adds exceptional value. Attract and retain your visitors with a variety of options.
  2. Restricted Access: Easily configure which articles are freely accessible and which are paid. Establish a steady income stream by providing exclusive content to your paying subscribers.
  3. Integrated Payment System: NBBL comes with an integrated payment system that makes charging for your premium content hassle-free. Accept multiple payment methods and maintain a transparent record of your earnings.
  4. Intuitive Control Panel: Our user-friendly interface makes content management a breeze. From creation to publication, everything is at your fingertips.
  5. Performance Tracking: Keep track of which content is performing best with our built-in analytics tools. Make informed decisions based on concrete data.

Why choose NBBL?

In an ever-evolving digital landscape, adapting and delivering valuable experiences is essential. NBBL provides you with the flexibility and power needed to grow and thrive online. Whether you want to diversify your income sources or simply provide exceptional value to your audience, NBBL is the ultimate tool to make it happen.

Download NBBL today and start unlocking the true potential of your WordPress website. Master content monetization like you’ve never imagined before.

Features

  • Every site which has our plugin implemented, will be able to use those NBBLs in any different site, allowing to to get audience from others competitors.
  • Users can pay for Subscriptions or single payment method
  • Auto Purchase Articles: never stop reading, we allow the user to keep reading every day, while we charge them for every article until they reach the daily maximum
  • We have daily/weekly/monthly/yearly maximums which allow the user to buy that daily pass, monthly pass, etc. Or if they bought the amount which equals that number, they will have automatically free the daily pass, or monthly, depending on the amount they spent
sections.installation:
1. Install the plugin
  2. Follow the link to create an account
  3. After the creation, go to WordPress integration and copy the API key
  4. Paste it into the WordPress Hamiltons NBBL configuration
  5. Configure each post for paid article or free article
sections.faq:
Is it Free?

It’s 100% free! We will be charging per transaction made.

When and how do I get paid?

Payouts will be sent to your bank account periodically. If you prefer a specific schedule for payouts, get in touch with us.

What types of payment do we accept?

We accept all major credit cards, and we are implementing the bank transactions
